Here is the list of available bosses:
Act I: Bloated Miller, Carrion Crone, The Devourer, The Rust King, Bramble Abomination, Draven the Eternal Praetor, Asinia Praetor Consort, Lachlann of Endless Lament, The Executioner, The Crowbell, King in the Mists, Bearer of Penitence, Candlemass the Living Rite, Count Geonor The Iron Count, Palewrithe Dreadworm, Swiftspade Bones.
